recipes.name: Omelette
recipes.ingredients: 2 eggs, Water, Pinch of salt, Pinch of pepper, Filling  ingredients
recipes.description: A folded pancake made of eggs with some additional vegetables, cheese, and meat

recipes.name: Kimchi Pancake
recipes.ingredients: 1/2 pounch sliced kimchi, 1/2 cup flour, 1/2 cup water, 3 scallions chopped, vegetable oil
recipes.description: A korean style pancake primarily made of sliced kimchi, flour batter, and sometimes other vegetables
